info.author: Red Hat
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
=========
tag-utils
=========

tag-utils is a collection of Pungi/Koji tag utilities for release-depot.

Prerequisites
-------------

tag-utils runs on Python 3.


Installing
----------

tag-utils is available on PyPI; it can be installed by running:

  pip install tag_utils

Alternatively, one could simply clone this repository and run:

  python setup.py install

Documentation
-------------

There is none.

Contributing
------------

Please fork and issue pull requests.

License
-------

This project is licensed under the MIT license.
See the [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for details


=======
History
=======
0.0.6 (2020-01-22)
------------------
* Add Errata support

0.0.5 (2019-12-18)
------------------
* Fix install requirements for PyPI
  
0.0.4 (2019-12-03)
------------------
* Support separate destination tag
* Add "--print" to display packages that would be
  tagged, but without actually performing any tagging

0.0.3 (2019-04-25)
------------------
* Support koji inheritance
* Fixes for tag-delta output

0.0.1 (2019-04-25)
------------------
* First published to github

info.summary: tag_utils is a collection of Pungi compose and Koji tag functions for release-depot.
info.html_description:
tag-utils

tag-utils is a collection of Pungi/Koji tag utilities for release-depot.

Prerequisites

tag-utils runs on Python 3.

Installing

tag-utils is available on PyPI; it can be installed by running:

pip install tag_utils

Alternatively, one could simply clone this repository and run:

python setup.py install

Documentation

There is none.

Contributing

Please fork and issue pull requests.

License

This project is licensed under the MIT license. See the [LICENSE](LICENSE) file for details

History

0.0.6 (2020-01-22)

  • Add Errata support

0.0.5 (2019-12-18)

  • Fix install requirements for PyPI

0.0.4 (2019-12-03)

  • Support separate destination tag
  • Add “–print” to display packages that would be tagged, but without actually performing any tagging

0.0.3 (2019-04-25)

  • Support koji inheritance
  • Fixes for tag-delta output

0.0.1 (2019-04-25)

  • First published to github
